Judas flung \w down|strong="G4496"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* pieces \w of|strong="G2532"\w* silver \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Temple|strong="G3485"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* left; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2532"\w* away \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hanged \w himself|strong="G1519"\w*.

\w So|strong="G1161"\w*, \w after|strong="G1161"\w* \w consultation|strong="G4824"\w*, \w they|strong="G1161"\w* used \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* buy \w the|strong="G1519"\w* ‘\w Potter|strong="G2763"\w*’s Field’ \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G1519"\w* \w burial|strong="G5027"\w* ground \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w foreigners|strong="G3581"\w*,

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w*, \w at|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w feast|strong="G1859"\w*, \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Governor|strong="G2232"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w accustomed|strong="G1486"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* grant \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* release \w of|strong="G1520"\w* \w any|strong="G3739"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* might choose.
